name: ltp
description: A schemafull binary format, designed for inplace reads, like a simpler version of captnproto

scripts.build: node test/generate.js > ltp.c && clang -nostdlib --target=wasm32 ltp.c -Wl,--no-entry -Wl,--export-all -o ltp.wasm
scripts.test: node test/index.js && node test/wasm.js && node test/any.js
